title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Asynchronous Online Mathematics Learning Experience Design (LXD)-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems with 80% accuracy by navigating interfaces based on UX design principles in asynchronous learning platforms
Learners can apply more than three types of job-linked mathematical thinking (reasoning, modeling, data analysis) using LXD-based video lectures and interactive activities
Learners can complete 100% of project assignments through collaboration with peer learners via online discussion boards and feedback systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
